  • Classes in dev.webfx.stack.com.bus used by dev.webfx.stack.com.bus
    Class
    Description
    Bus
    A distributed lightweight event bus which can encompass multiple machines.
    BusHook
    A hook that you can use to receive various events on the Bus.
    BusOptions
     
    DeliveryOptions
     
    Message
    Represents a message on the event bus.
    Registration
    Registration objects returned when an event handler is bound (e.g. via Bus.register(java.lang.String, dev.webfx.platform.async.Handler<dev.webfx.stack.com.bus.Message<T>>)), used to deregister.
    Registrations
    A Registration that will call Registration.unregister() on all added handlers if Registration.unregister() is called on this object.
    ThreadLocalBusContext
    Usage: try (ThreadLocalBusContext context = ThreadLocalBusContext.open(threadLocalBus)) { ...
